Workflow.Name: Assign random present to a Child for the active Christmas event
Workflow.Description: Select a random present from the active Gifts with a quantity assignable greater than 0 and assign it to the selected Child for the active Christmas event.

LocalizedName.description: Assign random present to a Child for the active Christmas event

Description.description: Select a random present from the active Gifts with a quantity assignable greater than 0 and assign it to the selected Child for the active Christmas event.
